Text: WOW! new album! cool! ty so much for this :)

What? no way is this album disappointing. Sure it''s nothing like the poison but once you accept that you see it's actually way better. I'm quite annoyed though, i actually paid for this and never got any bonus track, so i might torrent this anyway.
This album isn't disappointing in any way even though I've got tired of most of the songs but Hearts Burst Into Fire fullfills the whole album, damn I love that song!
